text: Adio may refer to: ==Business== *Adio (company), a subsidiary of skateboard company K2 Sports ==Music== ===Songs=== *"Adio" (song), a song by Montenegrin recording artist Knez that represented Montenegro at the Eurovision Song Contest 2015 *"Adio", a 1970 song by Ljupka Dimitrovska *"Adio", a 1985 song by Ljubisa Samardzic *"Adio", song by Oliver Dragojevic ==See also== *Addio (disambiguation) *Audio (disambiguation)
title: Adio
